original_title: Sri Lanka gets 107,000 tourists in February 2023
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has welcomed 107,639 tourists in February 2023, up 11.53 percent from the year earlier, official data showed.
Russia, UK, India and Germany remain the top three source markets since 2022.
From Russia 29,084 travelers visited Sri Lanka in February, followed by 13,714 Indians and 8,575 British.
So far in the first week of March from 1-6 we 24,363 tourists have arrived.
For 2023, the SLTDA anticipate 1.55 million tourist arrivals and expects to generate a revenue of 2.8 billion dollars.  (Colombo/Feb 02/2022)
